{{ fullname | escape | underline}}

.. currentmodule:: {{ module }}

.. autoclass:: {{ objname }}

   {% block methods %}
   
   {% if methods %}
   .. rubric:: Methods

   .. autosummary::
   {% for item in methods %}
      ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}

   {% block attributes %}
   {% if attributes %}
   .. rubric:: Attributes

   .. autosummary::
   {% for item in attributes %}
      ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}

   {% block ext_methods %}

   {% if methods %}
   {% for item in methods %}

   .. method:: ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}
